name: ax-mulrcl
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr))
comment: Closure law for multiplication in the real subfield of complex numbers. Axiom 7 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axmulrcl . Proofs should normally use ~ remulcl instead. (New usage is discouraged.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
